sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-navigation-drawer
    v-model="isVisible"
    class="side-bar"
    absolute
    temporary
    :color="`${this.$vuetify.theme.currentTheme.background}ac`"
  >
    <v-list
      nav
      dense
    >
      <v-list-item-group
        active-class="deep-purple--text text--accent-4"
      >
        <v-list-item
          style="flex: unset !important;display: flex;"
        >
          <v-list-item-icon
            style="align-self: center;"
          >
            <v-icon>mdi-home</v-icon>
          </v-list-item-icon>
          <v-list-item-title
            style="align-self: center; margin: 0 auto !important;"
          >
            Home
          </v-list-item-title>
        </v-list-item>
        <v-list-item>
          <v-list-item-icon>
            <v-icon>mdi-account</v-icon>
          </v-list-item-icon>
          <v-list-item-title>Account</v-list-item-title>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list-item-group>
    </v-list>
  </v-navigation-drawer>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "the-side-bar",
  data: () => ({
    isVisible: false
  }),
  methods: {
    toggleVisible() {
      this.isVisible = !this.isVisible;
    }
  }
}
</script>
